name: Bunny Run (Photosynthesauce)
description:
Run as far as you can as a speedy bunny! An endless runner with cute pixel graphics.

Controls

A & D - move left and right

Space - jump

R - restart

Escape - return to menu

Description

This is a little project I'm working on at the moment. I intend to add more levels, enemies, power ups, graphics, and an in-game currency shop to buy more bunny skins. 

The game is in a fully playable state at the moment though.
